Pancontinental Oil & Gas NL Company Profile

Pancontinental Oil & Gas NL is an Australia-based exploration company. The principal activity of the Company is exploration for oil and gas. The Company holds assets in Kenya and Namibia. The Company is in joint venture over an offshore area in the Walvis Basin, Namibia. In Walvis Basin, the Company holds interest in EL 0037, which covers over 17,295 square kilometers on approximately three blocks. The Company holds an interest in the L6 block onshore/offshore Kenya. Its L6 block in located in Lamu Basin, Kenya. The L6 block covers an area of approximately 5,010 square kilometers. The Company's subsidiaries include Euro Pacific Energy Pty Ltd, Pancontinental Namibia Pty Ltd, Afrex Ltd and Starstrike Resources Ltd. Read More
